Detailed Description

const std::string &  port,
const std::string &  doc_root
) 
 

Webem constructor.

Parameters:
[in] address IP address. In general, use "0.0.0.0"
[in] port port to listen on for browser requests e.g. "8080"
[in] doc_root path to folder containing html e.g. "./"

Member Function Documentation

void http::server::cWebem::Include (  std::string &  reply  ) 
 

Do not call from application code, used by server to include generated text.

Parameters:
in/out] reply text to include generated
The text is searched for "<!--#cWebemX-->". The X can be any string not containing "-->"

If X has been registered with cWebem then the associated function is called to generate text to be inserted.

void http::server::cWebem::RegisterActionCode (  const char *  idname,
webem_action_function  fun
) 
 

Specify link between form and application function to run when form submitted.

Parameters:
[in] idname string identifier
[in] fun fpointer to function

void http::server::cWebem::RegisterIncludeCode (  const char *  idname,
webem_include_function  fun
) 
 

Create a link between a string ID and a function to calculate the dynamic content of the string.

The function should return a pointer to a character buffer. This should be contain only ASCII characters ( Unicode code points 1 to 127 )

Parameters:
[in] idname string identifier
[in] fun pointer to function which calculates the string to be displayed

void http::server::cWebem::RegisterIncludeCodeW (  const char *  idname,
webem_include_function_w  fun
) 
 

Create a link between a string ID and a function to calculate the dynamic content of the string.

The function should return a pointer to wide character buffer. This should contain a wide character UTF-16 encoded unicode string. WEBEM will convert the string to UTF-8 encoding before sending to the browser.

Parameters:
[in] idname string identifier
[in] fun pointer to function which calculates the string to be displayed

void http::server::cWebem::Run (   ) 
 

Start the server.

This does not return.

If application needs to continue, start new thread with call to this method.
